items.sentence: My brother is very good at playing the guitar.
Did you know that I\'d never done that before?
Did you know that Tom doesn\'t like chocolate?
Did you know that Tom was a friend of Mary\'s?
We can\'t talk here. Let\'s go somewhere else.
I\'m surprised no one else heard the gunshots.
I\'ve been really lonely these past two weeks.
I\'ve finally found the woman I want to marry.
Tom doesn\'t understand a word you\'re saying.
Tom doesn\'t understand why we\'re doing this.
I always have fruit and oatmeal for breakfast.
I always thought Tom knew how to speak French.
I always wash new underwear before wearing it.
I always wear a helmet when I ride my bicycle.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
They adapted themselves to the change quickly.
They had no money to buy concert tickets with.
They have something in common with each other.
Tom knows this area like the back of his hand.
Tom lives about twenty minutes away from Mary.
